''No thanks,' states say to bankruptcy idea California Treasurer Bill Lockyer did not mince words Monday( January 24) when he addressed a federal proposal that would let states declare bankruptcy. It's a cynical proposal intended to incite a panicked response to a phony crisis, Bill Lockyer , a Democrat, said during a conference call with reporters organized by the Economic Policy Institute, a Washington, D.C., think tank.
